modShortDescription: A very simple customized UI which moves the food/water bars out from under the toolbelt and adds then underneath the health/stamina bars.
modDescription:
A very simple customized UI which moves the food/water bars out from under the toolbelt and adds then underneath the health/stamina bars.

Also adds the “locked slots” functionality to the UI for the sort/stash buttons.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-ui-simple)**

If you find any issues or have a suggestion for improvement, please [open an issue](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues) and Donovan will look into it ASAP.

**Credits:** [Donovan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/donovan/)
